title: How to Make Fish Bait Using Bread

steps.title: Take at least 2 slices of bread.
steps.content: Take at least 2 slices of bread.

steps.title: Turn on the water in your sink.

steps.title: Put a slice of bread under the water and start rolling the slice of bread into a ball.

steps.title: Repeat step 3 for all the slices of bread you want for fishing bait.

steps.title: Go to your fishing spot with the balls of bread inside a plastic bag and your fishing gear.
